resources.string:
Do it 
___ 
Divide all your works into 25 minutes and be more productive! 
[This is known as the "Pomodoro technique", try looking up on Wikipedia to learn more about it] 

All you have to do is start the timer and start doing whatever you want and do it non-stop for 25 minutes. The app will automatically remind you to take a 5 minute break after the work period is over. It'll also notify you to start work after the break ;) 

___ 
Author: 
Mohammed Sazid Al Rashid
